name: Music Pro Summit
content: Music Pro Summit, presented by Indie Week, is the place where music industry visionaries converge to explore strategies to help define the next wave of music and commerce. From distribution to synchronization, publishing to NFTs, production to songwriting, all aspects of the ever evolving business are discussed, dissected and determined by the top names in the field. Music Pro Summit is the place to be; the new intersection of art and business.
